001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
004
005import java.io.File;
006import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.PrintWriter;
009import java.time.LocalDateTime;
010
011/**
012 * This class represents an assignment give to students in CS410J.
013 *
014 * @author David Whitlock
015 */
016public class Assignment extends NotableImpl {
017
018  public enum AssignmentType {
019    PROJECT,
020    QUIZ,
021    OTHER,
022    POA,
023    OPTIONAL
024  }
025
026
027  public enum ProjectType {
028    APP_CLASSES,
029    TEXT_FILE,
030    PRETTY_PRINT,
031    XML,
032    REST,
033    ANDROID
034  }
035
036  private String name;
037  private String description;
038  private double points;
039  private int canvasId;
040  private AssignmentType type;
041  private LocalDateTime dueDate;
042  private ProjectType projectType;
043
044  /**
045   * Creates a new <code>Assignment</code> with the given name and
046   * point value.
047   */
048  public Assignment(String name, double points) {
049    this.name = name;
050    this.points = points;
051    this.type = AssignmentType.PROJECT;
052    this.setDirty(false);
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Returns the name of this <code>Assignment</code>
057   */
058  public String getName() {
059    return this.name;
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Returns the number of points this <code>Assignment</code> is
064   * worth
065   */
066  public double getPoints() {
067    return this.points;
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Sets the number of points that this <code>Assignment</code> is
072   * worth.
073   */
074  public Assignment setPoints(double points) {
075    this.setDirty(true);
076    this.points = points;
077    return this;
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Returns a description of this <code>Assignment</code>
082   */
083  public String getDescription() {
084    return this.description;
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Sets the description of this <code>Assignment</code>
089   */
090  public Assignment setDescription(String description) {
091    this.setDirty(true);
092    this.description = description;
093    return this;
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Returns the type of this <code>Assignment</code>
098   */
099  public AssignmentType getType() {
100    return this.type;
101  }
102
103  /**
104   * Sets the type of this <code>Assignment</code>
105   */
106  public Assignment setType(AssignmentType type) {
107    this.setDirty(true);
108    this.type = type;
109    return this;
110  }
111
112
113  public Assignment setCanvasId(int canvasId) {
114    this.canvasId = canvasId;
115    this.setDirty(true);
116    return this;
117  }
118
119  public int getCanvasId() {
120    return canvasId;
121  }
122
123
124  /**
125   * Returns a brief textual description of this
126   * <code>Assignment</code>
127   */
128  public String toString() {
129    return "Assignment " + this.getName() + " worth " +
130           this.getPoints();
131  }
132  
133
134  private static PrintWriter err = new PrintWriter(System.err, true);
135
136  /**
137   * Prints usage information about the main program.
138   */
139  private static void usage() {
140    err.println("\njava Assignment [options] -xmlFile xmlFile " +
141                "-name name");
142    err.println("  where [options] are:");
143    err.println("  -points points        Points assignment is worth");
144    err.println("  -description desc     Description of assignment");
145    err.println("  -type type            Type of assignment " +
146                "(PROJECT, QUIZ, or OTHER)");
147    err.println("  -note note            Note about assignment");
148    err.println("\n");
149    System.exit(1);
150  }
151
152  /**
153   * Main program that creates/edits an <code>Assignment</code> in a
154   * grade book stored in an XML file.
155   */
156  public static void main(String[] args) {
157    String fileName = null;
158    String name = null;
159    String points = null;
160    String desc = null;
161    AssignmentType type = null;
162    String note = null;
163
164    // Parse the command line
165    for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
166      if (args[i].equals("-xmlFile")) {
167        if (++i >= args.length) {
168          err.println("** Missing XML file name");
169          usage();
170        }
171
172        fileName = args[i];
173
174      } else if (args[i].equals("-name")) {
175        if (++i >= args.length) {
176          err.println("** Missing assignment name");
177          usage();
178        }
179
180        name = args[i];
181
182      } else if (args[i].equals("-points")) {
183        if (++i >= args.length) {
184          err.println("** Missing points value");
185          usage();
186        }
187
188        points = args[i];
189
190      } else if (args[i].equals("-description")) {
191        if (++i >= args.length) {
192          err.println("** Missing description");
193          usage();
194        }
195        
196        desc = args[i];
197
198      } else if (args[i].equals("-type")) {
199        if (++i >= args.length) {
200          err.println("** Missing type");
201          usage();
202        }
203
204        // Make sure type is valid
205        switch (args[i]) {
206          case "PROJECT":
207            type = AssignmentType.PROJECT;
208            break;
209          case "QUIZ":
210            type = AssignmentType.QUIZ;
211            break;
212          case "POA":
213            type = AssignmentType.POA;
214            break;
215          case "OTHER":
216            type = AssignmentType.OTHER;
217            break;
218          case "OPTIONAL":
219            type = AssignmentType.OPTIONAL;
220            break;
221          default:
222            err.println("** Invalid type: " + args[i]);
223            usage();
224            break;
225        }
226
227      } else if (args[i].equals("-note")) {
228        if (++i >= args.length) {
229          err.println("** Missing note");
230          usage();
231        }
232
233        note = args[i];
234
235      } else {
236        err.println("** Unknown option: " + args[i]);
237      }
238    }
239
240    // Verify command line
241    if (fileName == null) {
242      err.println("** No file name specified");
243      usage();
244    }
245
246    if (name == null) {
247      err.println("** No assignment name specified");
248      usage();
249    }
250
251    File file = new File(fileName);
252    if (!file.exists()) {
253      err.println("** Grade book file " + fileName + 
254                  " does not exist");
255      System.exit(1);
256    }
257
258    if (name == null) {
259      err.println("** No assignment name specified");
260      usage();
261    }
262
263    GradeBook book = null;
264    try {
265      XmlGradeBookParser parser = new XmlGradeBookParser(file);
266      book = parser.parse();
267
268    } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
269      err.println("** Could not find file: " + ex.getMessage());
270      System.exit(1);
271
272    } catch (IOException ex) {
273      err.println("** IOException during parsing: " + ex.getMessage());
274      System.exit(1);
275
276    } catch (ParserException ex) {
277      err.println("** Exception while parsing " + file + ": " + ex);
278      System.exit(1);
279    }
280
281    // Get the assignment
282    Assignment assign = book.getAssignment(name);
283    if (assign == null) {
284      // Did we specify a points value?
285      if (points == null) {
286        err.println("** No points specified");
287        usage();
288      }
289
290      double value = -1.0;
291      try {
292        value = Double.parseDouble(points);
293
294      } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
295        err.println("** Not a valid point value: " + points);
296        System.exit(1);
297      }
298
299      if (value < 0.0) {
300        err.println("** Not a valid point value: " + value);
301        System.exit(1);
302      }
303
304      // Create a new Assignment
305      assign = new Assignment(name, value);
306      book.addAssignment(assign);
307    }
308
309    // Set the properties of the assignment
310    if (desc != null) {
311      assign.setDescription(desc);
312    }
313
314    if (type != null) {
315      assign.setType(type);
316    }
317
318    if (note != null) {
319      assign.addNote(note);
320    }
321
322    // Write the grade book back out to the XML file
323    try {
324      XmlDumper dumper = new XmlDumper(file);
325      dumper.dump(book);
326
327    } catch (IOException ex) {
328      err.println("** While dumping to " + file + ": " + ex);
329      System.exit(1);
330    }
331  }
332
333  public void setDueDate(LocalDateTime dueDate) {
334    this.dueDate = dueDate;
335  }
336
337  public LocalDateTime getDueDate() {
338    return dueDate;
339  }
340
341  public boolean isSubmissionLate(LocalDateTime submissionTime) {
342    if (this.dueDate == null) {
343      return false;
344
345    } else {
346      return submissionTime.isAfter(this.dueDate);
347    }
348  }
349
350  public Assignment setProjectType(ProjectType projectType) {
351    this.projectType = projectType;
352    return this;
353  }
354
355  public ProjectType getProjectType() {
356    return projectType;
357  }
358
359}
